content: On http://build.fhir.org/subscription.html#resource, "end" is interpreted as "When to automatically DELETE the subscription". However, on http://build.fhir.org/subscription-definitions.html#Subscription.end, "end" means "The time for the server to turn the subscription off". Since deleting and turning off are two total different behaviors, could you clarify which is the correct one?
my take is that it should be 'turn off' and delete if desired. It would be good to make a task to clarify this and correct the description and definition
